cparser_context_t Struct Reference

A structure passed back in action function. More...

#include <cparser.h>


Data Fields

cparser_t * parser
 Pointer to the parser instance.
void * cookie [CPARSER_MAX_NESTED_LEVELS]
 An array of opaque pointers for nested levels.

Detailed Description

A structure passed back in action function.

It contains the parser where the command is accepted and some cookie that can be set the caller.
